author: Faith Mckenzye
text: you can’t even be a good person these days without people taking advantage of you

author: Faith Mckenzye
text: I got so much built up anger in me

author: Faith Mckenzye
text: feelings of sadness after making a decision don’t always mean you made the wrong decision. good things aren’t supposed to come/be easy.

author: Faith Mckenzye
text: so i’ll end with this. if someone has done unforgivable things to you, just let them go. because you’ll be forcing yourself to love them how you once did but that isn’t possible. do yourself a favor and just cut your losses before it’s too late. https://t.co/J4cFskuzFK

author: Faith Mckenzye
text: at some point, forgiving people becomes more of a burden than a blessing because you constantly allow the same behaviors yet want a different outcome. then you trick yourself into thinking that you’re over it, whole time you still harbor hatred in your heart.
